email_subject: Dear Steve Jobs: At Macworld, show me this... [ANCHORDESK]
email_body:
I'm headed to NYC for Macworld Expo. Steve Jobs usually makes big announcements at these shows--last time around it was those cool new iMacs. I don't know what he's got up his sleeve this time, but here's what I'm hoping for.

NOTE: Why we're changing our publishing schedule

PLUS: AnchorDesk Radio: From Apple's Jaguar to Ed McMahon
